opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: In Re Discipline of Poole No. D-2406

opinion:
543 U.S. 1140

IN RE DISCIPLINE OF POOLE
No. D-2406.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 22, 2005.

1

John Michael Poole, of Miami, Fla., is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
